reviewText: Movie quality is not the greatest looks like it was dubbed from a VHS tape.no menu no special features nothing. No movie write up on cover case no artwork on cover case just black case with the insert that says no mercy man.not pleased with this purchase.
has to be one of the worst movies I have ever seen. The acting is horrible, the story is worse. There is nothing else to say, Just stay away from this turd.
Just saw a print of this screened by Exhumed Films in Philly. Crowd loved it. Full of jaw dropping action and belly laughs. If you're a fan of revenge exploitation this is a must see!
I saw this movie back in 1973,when I was in the service. I think it is a good movie,with lots of action. I had a hard time finding it,but when I did,I had to purchase it. Good movie||
